Description of incident: A laptop was stolen from a Battelle & Battelle LLC employee's vehicle.  The laptop contained information on an audit of the Community Blood Center's 401K plan as well as information on the employees of Springfield-based Ohio Masonic Home.  The stolen laptop needs multiple levels of authentication in order to access the sensitive data, according to a representative of Battelle.  Masonic Home officials report 600 of its employees were affected.
